desc: 最大ＨＰを５０%アップ＆ターン毎ＨＰ回復＆攻撃時、確率でＨＰ吸収＆ＨＰ２０％以下の時、一度だけ戦闘不能を耐える効果が発動

dictionary.lore: The Nine Sacred Treasures are said to have been feared even by the gods. Amongst them was the staff Kortz Lezetta, which was sealed in the utmost depths of a sacred territory and guarded by the 12 Guardians of the Gods. However, it is said that no one knows the whereabouts of the staff after the 12 Guardians' insurrection. If it were to reappear in this world again, it would most likely bring with it a whirlwind of chaos.

name: 神器コルツ=レゼッタ
